channel.title: All Stories on GaadiKey Memories
channel.description: Recent content in All Stories on GaadiKey Memories

item.title: Childhood Cycle Memories: My buddy my Chandu
item.description: ##Memories of My First Gaadi by Akshata Belludi I guess I was 6 when dad taught me cycling that’s among many things I owe to dad. It was his way of making me strong. Take me on the top of a small hill and leave me from there promising he will hold me. Once I start it’s just me screaming with my buddy and the break never worked!! Thats when I experienced my first adrenaline gush.
